name: Business Negotiation Scenario
description: Three companies are bidding for a lucrative contract. Their negotiation skills, strategic alliances, and individual motivations will determine who secures the deal.

config.name: Corporate Conference Center
config.description: A large conference center hosting three companies in separate but interconnected meeting rooms. The central area allows for impromptu discussions and collaboration.

Company A Meeting Room.description: A spacious room with a large conference table, comfortable chairs, and digital tablets for presentations.
observations: Team is focused on finalizing their proposal.
A tension can be felt between team members.

Central Area.description: An open space with a coffee station, refreshments, and comfortable seating areas. It serves as a hub for informal negotiations.
observations: Teams are engaging in friendly conversations.
A mix of seriousness and casualness is present.

Company B Meeting Room.description: Similar to Company A, with a digital projector for presentations.
observations: Team is reviewing the competition's proposal.
Some members appear hesitant about their strategy.

Company C Meeting Room.description: The largest room, featuring a large table with an expansive view of the conference center.
observations: Leaders are confident about their position.

events: A representative from another company enters the Central Area and offers valuable insights.
A team member from Company A notices a strategic error in their proposal.
